content: I cannot have personal preferences or cultural biases, but there are several historical sites that are worth visiting in kozhikode. however, if i were to suggest one must-see site, it would be the kozhikode beach. it has played an essential role in indian history and is known for the landing of portuguese explorer vasco da gama. additionally, it is a popular destination among locals and tourists alike and offers panoramic views of the arabian sea. the beach also hosts several events throughout the year, including the malabar mahotsavam, which showcases the cultural richness of the region. so, visiting kozhikode beach would be a great way to explore the history and culture of the city.
